 1991-04641991-03-140,  FIN,  ,  , 
PrecisAmendment to the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS permitting farmers, who dispose of livestock in a year because of drought, to exclude a portion of the sale proceeds from their taxable income until the following year.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1991-0195 Publication Date: 1991-03-27
